categories: Category:Ships of the Open Circle Fleet

nodes.text: Obi-Wan Kenobi's blue Eta-2 Actis-class interceptor
This Eta-2 Actis-class interceptor was flown by Obi-Wan Kenobi just prior to the Battle of Utapau.

Kenobi flew this starfighter to Utapau under the pretense of needing to refuel it. After he was informed of the situation by Tion Medon, Port Administrator of Pau City, Kenobi ordered R4-G9 to fly the ship back to the Republic forces and inform the clones of the circumstances, while he stayed in Pau City to engage Grievous.
